title: goinstall should work for packages that use import "C"
body:
by **anh.hai.trinh**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. goinstall bitbucket.org/taruti/go-readline

What is the expected output?
a successful installation

What do you see instead?
goinstall: C: open /home/aht/lib/go/src/pkg/C: no such file or directory

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
linux amd64

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
821ca9bf0ec5 tip
